MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L20 postcode area of Bootle, affecting properties in Norman Road, Harris Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  09:20AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are working on an underground cable fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:11AM on 12th November 2020
